column4: someones help me please, i have a synaptics touchpad in my laptop and in windows 7 i can make gestures like rotating images, zoom, with two fingers, but in ubuntu 9.10 i cant make these, 3 days ago i type a comand in the terminal for view the touchpad information and in the fingers tab show only one finger detected when i have two or three. I saw last week that synaptics make the linux gesture suit but i ca
<mas> nt find the download link in the synaptics page. Sorry by my bad english
the gesture suit is not released yet
